title: Middle Space
description: 2D mobile space shooter with gasoline, shop, scoring, and boss fights. Best Student Project (HAGO Award, three-person team). Fully playable on mobile.

title: Spranch
description: Web-based presentation application designed to simplify creating and presenting slides. Focused on branching flows and smooth navigation.

title: AI Face Recognition
description: AI-powered attendance application with face recognition; users register with multiple images for accurate verification and can use the system to log in or mark attendance. Backend ensures secure storage and verification, while the Flutter frontend provides cross-platform access.
